title: Can't start a game

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I couldn't launch the game at all last night with the bug that had been affecting everyone, but now that I can launch the game, the Play button is greyed out and I can't start anything... is there a fix for this?

replies.body: It seems like the client is trying to patch, which is why you can't select play.  Does restarting your client start that update?
No :( It does it automatically, it will appear to be "finished" updating... and then it still isn't clickable.
